blueprint.description: Installs tmux on Linux and macOS
blueprint.overview: [Tmux](https://github.com/tmux/tmux/wiki) is a terminal multiplexer. It enables a number of terminals to be created, accessed, and controlled from a single screen. Tmux may be detached from a screen and continue running in the background, then later reattached.
blueprint.name: tmux
blueprint.title: tmux
